member.name: T:Projectplace.Gui.TweenPairs
member.summary: Utility class for convenient listing of property=>destination_value "pairs" new TweenPairs() {{"X", 200}, {"Opacity", 0.2}}

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.TweenPairs.Add(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Add a tweener, and start playing

member.name: T:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener
member.summary: Statically this class is responsible for managing the life cycle of all registered tweener insances. Instances of the Tweener class are responsible for animating given properties for a given object.

member.name: T:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.onCompleteFunction
member.summary: It's possible to register functions on the tweener instance to be called when the animation is completed

member.name: T:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.ease
member.param: Current time (in timer ticks)
Starting value
Duration (in timer ticks)
Delta value

member.name: T:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.PropertyProxy
member.summary: Some properties are not available for updating directly on the object we're animating. For those occations we "fake" properties by using a PropertyProxy.

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.PropertyProxy.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: The proxy objects pretends to be the proxied control when participating in dictionaries and such.

member.name: T:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.LocationProxy
member.summary: Location.X and Location.Y are not directly updateable on .Net controls.

member.name: T:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.TweenData
member.summary: Reflection is used to read and set properties on the animated objects.

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.#ctor(System.Object,Projectplace.Gui.TweenPairs,Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.ease,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Instances of the Tweener class are responsible for animating given properties for a given object.
member.param: The object to animate
A list of propertynames and their destination values.
The easing funtion to use for the animation.
The duration (in timer ticks) the animation should take to complete.
How long to wait (in timer ticks) before starting the animation.

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.#ctor(System.Object,Projectplace.Gui.TweenPairs,Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.ease,System.Int32,System.Int32,Projectplace.Gui.Tweener)
member.summary: Create a new tweener

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.setOnComplete(Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.onCompleteFunction)
member.summary: Set a function to execute when the tweener is completed

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.add(Projectplace.Gui.Tweener)
member.summary: Register a tweener that this class should manage.

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.timer_Tick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Each timer tick we update all active tweeners. When a tweener is finished we remove it, add any chained tweener and call any onComplete function registred.

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.animate
member.summary: This timer tick's fraction of the transition of the animated object takes place here.

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.tween(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Fetch a value from the easing formula.

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.easeInQuad(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: quadratic (t^2) easingFunction in - accelerating from zero velocity

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.easeOutQuad(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: quadratic (t^2) easingFunction out - deccelerating to zero velocity

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.easeInOutQuad(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: quadratic easingFunction in/out - acceleration until halfway, then deceleration

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.easeInCubic(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: cubic easingFunction in - accelerating from zero velocity

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.easeOutCubic(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: cubic easingFunction out - deccelerating to zero velocity

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.easeInOutCubic(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: cubic easingFunction in/out - acceleration until halfway, then deceleration

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.easeInQuart(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: quartic easingFunction in - accelerating from zero velocity

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.easeInExpo(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: exponential (2^t) easingFunction in - accelerating from zero velocity

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.easeOutExpo(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: exponential (2^t) easingFunction out - decelerating to zero velocity

member.name: M:Projectplace.Gui.Tweener.easeOutBack(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: easingFunction past the destination then back - deccelerating to zero

member.summary: linear tweening (no easingFunction)
